https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xI1yWYSYnv3GxWFoC12IXsXOpX0.jpg A documentary on the career of William Greaves, featuring Greaves, his wife and co-producer Louise Archambault, actor Ruby Dee, filmmaker St. Clair Bourne, and film scholar Scott MacDonald. Released within Criterion's Symbiopsychotaxiplasm set. Discovering William Greaves
